original_text: And the Ammonites came out and drew up in battle array at the entrance of the city, and the kings who had come were by themselves in the open country.
korean_text: 암몬 자손은 나가서 성문 앞에 진을 치고 도우러 온 여러 왕은 따로 들에 있더라

sentences.original_text: and drew up in battle array at the entrance of the city
and the kings who had come
were by themselves in the open country.
